Hi Pamela, 
While the Knowledge Network does not currently have any documents on Arizona local government cell phone allowance policies we do have some from other local governments around the country. 

This is an example from Delaware City, OH that they still may find useful. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303814/Cell_Phone_Allowance_Policy

-In this previously asked question local government officials weigh in on cell phone allowances vs. cell phone issuing http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20483
-This is another cell phone allowance policy from the city of Brentwood.
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/301519
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

text:
